  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="33514" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="33514" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.38</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="4500">4,500</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="794"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Carlisle</b> by <b>Parfums de Marly</b> is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. <b>Carlisle</b> was launched in 2015. Top notes are Nutmeg, Green Apple and Saffron; middle notes are Tonka Bean, Rose, Osmanthus and Davana; base notes are Patchouli, Vanilla and Opoponax. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Carlisle by Parfum XXI is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Carlisle was launched in 2015. Top notes are bergamot and mandarin orange; middle notes are violet and jasmine; base notes are guaiac wood, patchouli and cardamom. This edition of Parfums De Marly Harrods London exclusive.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">139</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May not be mass pleasing or attractive to everyone
                </div>

                    Similarities to other PDM fragrances that may not be enjoyed by all

height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oswanson123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2139536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oswanson123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139536">oswanson123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733406687" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im quite partial to oriental, spicy scentsthats just my cup of tea. The spices are balanced by the vanilla &amp; tonka bean and I think this is masterfully crafted. I have never smelled Red tobacco but fragcomm is saying this resembles that if you enjoyed that you may like this.<br />
<br />
You can just look at the note breakdown and tell this is  for colder times of the year. On my skin this radiates like crazy when its cold out. To me, its so well blended that not one note stands out sharply over the other. I want to say there are leather notes here but im<br />
Not sure. Sometimes it also reminds me of the dry down in Ombre Leather by TF. Basically parts of Carlisle are fruity and almost animalic to me(like Ombre Leather)but not over powering or stinky. Now, I quite like that but I do need to be in the mood and right setting for it. Its a strong niche quality performer with kind of a designer appeal to the scent. <br />
<br />
<br />
This is not blind buy safe though just like<br />
Red tobacco probably isnt blind buy safe either. I do strongly recommend Carlisle but you need to like those dark mysterious fragrances. You  also should be more mature I dont see a teenager wearing this. Try it out around this Holliday season its very pleasing and likable just not versatileand im ok with that.<br />
<br />
Cheers!<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2371594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2371594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JJ2137"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JJ2137" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1882714">JJ2137</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733340836" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After trying many samples I didn't expect that anything from PdM would impress me, but this one is super good. Love the fruitiness at the start, really gives an impression of an apple. Also, it's very boozy, reminds me of rum. It's not a "patchouli bomb" like some people suggest (go sniff something like Jovoy Psychedelique, now that's patchouli bomb), its well blended with vanilla and tonka bean in the drydown.I strongly prefer this over Red Tobacco.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2370763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2370763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samfjorg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2273882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samfjorg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273882">Samfjorg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733337229" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great scent. A very strong 10 hours and lasts on skin for at least 24 hours. It smells amazing, I really enjoy the dark smoky mix of apple and vanilla. Got me lots of compliments at thanksgiving. Although you should spray cautiously because this one is a power house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2370713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2370713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369636" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doodluv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1386268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1386268.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="doodluv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369636ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369636" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1386268">doodluv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733257715" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know what video I watched that gave me the impression that this would be a predominantly green woody scent, and therefore a must try for me. <br />
<br />
I can't remember if I got mixed up between this and something else or I'm just imagining things. <br />
<br />
In any case, that was a long way to say this isn't what I expected at all. <br />
<br />
There is no green facet to this, at all. <br />
<br />
It's dark, very spicy, woody, and patchouli dominant. <br />
<br />
Reminds me a bit of James from Atkinsons but this smells better I think. <br />
<br />
Has the same issue as James too, namely that although it's an interesting high quality scent, I just don't see myself wearing this. <br />
You'd think winter/fall would be perfect for this, but there's so many other great cold weather options that don't have you smelling like church incense.<br />
<br />
Pass from me, as is my usual with PdM. I really don't get along with this house.<br />
<br />
Edit: On my second wearing, I'm getting much more vanilla popping through which gives a lot more balance to the spices. Still not a huge fan but I like it more than I did the first time I tried it on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2369636"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2369636#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364532" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="urakhiaziz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="urakhiaziz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364532ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364532" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); Its dark and very mysterious. Its not for everyone for sure, NOT a blind buy type of purchase. I give it a 7.5/10 not really for me but I do appreciate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2362475"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2362475#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="infiniteambrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2219245.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="infiniteambrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Encre-Noire-1834.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1834.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encre Noire"title="Encre Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); Very dark patchouli. Lowkey need to warm up to it but it's captivating</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2356889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2356889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355562" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bartca89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1970256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bartca89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Le-Parfum-23099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"title="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970256">bartca89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A super well-crafted, dark and exotic scent. Solid performance for me. I think it's worth the cost, if you love it.<br />
<br />
However.... Dumont Bravanzo Baron is an outstanding, very high-quality clone of this, and might possibly be even better. For some strange reason it's not listed on Fragrantica, but it's definitely worth checking out. (Gent Scents and others on YouTube give it high praise.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2355562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2355562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2348579"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2348579#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ooss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ooss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289823">Ooss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is by far the best fragrance in my collection worth every penny, also best blind buy, this is what heaven should smells like, i have many nieche but carlisle is in another level nothing smells like it, quality top notch, new formula 2023 "Vol 81%" performs like a beast easy 12h+ and i swear this beast still projects strong till the other day "this is for ppl saying sh** about new formula"<br />
Carlisle for me easy 15 out of 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2347267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2347267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341194" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="reubenmatts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="reubenmatts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Grand-Soir-40816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grand Soir"title="Grand Soir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200593">reubenmatts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 14:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Parfums de Marly Carlisle is a powerful, statement-making fragrance. It opens with a bold mix of green apple and nutmeg, creating an invigorating yet slightly spicy top. This is soon met with patchouli, a grounding note that anchors the fragrance with a rich, earthy depth, giving it a confident edge. As it transitions, the heart brings in tonka bean and rose, adding warmth and a touch of sweetness that, when blended with the apple, creates that "vanillic apple pie" aroma - a beautifully unique and inviting twist.<br />
The dry-down is luxurious, with creamy vanilla and rich, amber woods, creating a smooth and powerful base. It's undoubtedly a beast-mode fragrance, projecting far and lasting well into the night, ideal for winter and evening wear. Lasted 3 days on my clothes. It is best worn for moments when you want to make a strong impression, as its strength could overwhelm in close or professional spaces. With its remarkable blend and distinct character, it's a solid 10/10 for anyone looking for a standout, robust fragrance. P.S. This is something that batman would wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2341194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2341194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340241" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 16:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I get is patchouli and a tiny hint of green apple. Smells like I have my nose shoved into a tree, especially in the drydown. It smooths out after a few minutes as the vanilla starts coming through, but it remains a patchouli bomb even then, so its absolutely not for me. Has moderate sillage and lasts all day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2340241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2340241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336611" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm definitely not a fan of patchouli notes in fragrances. Out of my whole collection, I might own maybe 2 perfumes with patchouli in it and the note is crafted and hidden very well within those fragrances. Not only is it that I don't like scent of patchouli in general even though I like how it can make a formulation dark it makes the scent profile overly mature in my opinion. The patchouli is prominent within Carlisle and as a result I'm not a fan. Carlisle is definitely not a bad scent it's actually pretty good, but maybe better suited for the mature man. I'd give Carlisle a 7/10, good for mature individuals and those who likes dark fragrances but this isn't for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2336611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2336611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Seems to have pretty good performance as I always pick up whiffs of it throughout the day on him. Smells high end and unique. I plan to buy a bottle of this at some point because i like it so much</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2335956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2335956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332032" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VanillaAddict1220"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2302448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VanillaAddict1220" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2302448">VanillaAddict1220</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Carlisle is my signature scent, this is so good (to me at least) I bought 3 bottles of this. Are newer batches worth the price? No. If you find any batch older than 2020, yes! A manly semi-gourmand perfume that projects really well, smells like heaven and lasts long! The notes listed are accurate, but definitely give it a smell first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2330488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2330488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325550" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jcarolinajr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329594.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="jcarolinajr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Pi-39.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pi"title="Pi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329594">jcarolinajr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 20:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well, one may as well recognize a different category of perfumery when selecting at this price point; and so, I accept the challenge! I certainly would pay the price if there were a reason. For example, keeping a romantic love intrigued and captivated.  Heres how that works. Wear Carlisle to be with the right person and you may find they are always standing close in to you to get a whiff of your deep clean unique scent. Carlisle is deeply subtle and utterly intimate; so intimate you can wear it in a crowd and not be noticed or obtrusive. It is not a loud come thither type of scent. It is for those worth discerning the deeper treasures discovered in the ruby mines of Burmese rainforests, or on some tropical isle where a cool mountain river journeys into the warm sea. A rare, very rare, and heady occasion where unexpected destiny surfaces to be a savory reality and a lifetime memory. None but the righteous! Trust.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2325550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2325550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320608" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MuskyBro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MuskyBro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320608ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320608" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559494">MuskyBro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 05:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Carlisle is not a shower, but a grower. Carlisle can be a turn off at first sight, it opens a bit too medicinal with the nutmeg, saffron, and rose being the prominent notes. However, this fragrance becomes one of the sexiest and most alluring fragrances ever made as it sits on your skin. Carlisle ages like fine wine, it truly blossoms in about an hour, the vanilla and patchouli takes over, with a hint of the notes from open still detectable, but on the background. This version of Carlisle is guaranteed to get you laid more likely with a guy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2320608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2320608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; blonde amber but without that dry-smoky tobacco. doesn't last on my skin though but smells pretty good!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2318378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2318378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
The nutmeg here gives certain darkness to the scent, then gets balanced by the tonka bean, the patchouli and vanilla. Rhum is not listed but this fragrance has a boozy undertone. <br />
<br />
Performance of my 2021 batch is good tbh, not the longest lastig i have but performs decently.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2309093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2309093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I really wouldn't mind owning this... but I  80 like this, I defo don't 200 like this.<br />

Dont get me wrong, I like some patchouli, but its overpowering here. The dry down gets nicer, as vanilla starts to emerge, taking this from about a 6/10 to a 7/10. If you liked Layton but thought it was for a younger man, you need to try Carlisle. Absolutely beautiful, and the performance is monstrous. One spray filled my entire house. Classic, sexy, one of the last niche fragrances from Parfums De Marly. <br />
<br />
Dark, spicy, and sweet. Not blind buy safe! 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2303626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2303626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302171" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Imortelle Yo Mama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118699"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2118699.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Imortelle Yo Mama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Enclave-62856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Enclave"title="Enclave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118699">Imortelle Yo Mama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 05:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update. Kind of boring scent that can overpower easily. Very fast nose blind. But trust it is there. 4 sprays MAX. not very vanilla, so misleading tags. Spicey aromatic-vanilla would be more fitting.  The patchouli is star here, if your nit a fan, don't even try. At first I loved this, now it's a solid like, 7.5 / 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2302171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2302171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298721" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mostafa385"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mostafa385" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307210">mostafa385</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dry down is close to Red tobacco but this is refined &amp; better. It also has some resemblance to tobacco vanilla tom ford but the later is more sweet. Extreme spicy vanilla with hints of rose.<br />
Performance is above average, longevity 8-10 hours &amp; above average projection for 2/3 hours. Good for fall &amp; winter.<br />
It is quality &amp; refined, however, I did not enjoy the scent profile to the extent of investing in a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2298721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2298721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114543">sononswife</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-28">09/28/24 20:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>handsome in a bottle. read the name Carlisle and immediately thought of Carlisle from twilight. Someone else said it was like a vampires library and I couldnt agree more! reviews say masculine leaning but I would wear this. smells like smoking a vanilla cigarette, reading a thick book, drinking bourbon + cola, in a dark lit room, vase of roses. apple crumble and whipped cream for dessert. a cozy level of powdery.<br />
ladies, buy this for your guy. or for yourself if youre feeling femme fatale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2298491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2298491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296495" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="batmanvn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1520292.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="batmanvn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1520292">batmanvn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 23:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>absolutely wonderful</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2296495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2296495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294912" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trendkill97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1094278.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trendkill97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Black-Aoud-1142.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1142.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Aoud"title="Black Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1094278">Trendkill97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sandalwood is missing in the notes here on Fragrantica. It's listed on the website however. That's exactly what I was wondering, the dry down of this scent is based on sandalwood, rich and robust. There's an incense-y dark sweetness to the scent. Very classy, loud, mysterious yet mass appealing. Crunchy green apple, prominent saffron, with the hints of rose-osmanthus all come together to form that fruity syrupy tinge, while the nutmeg with the woods, incense-y opoponax and davana-patchouli make it  dense, slowly overpower that fruity sweet side of the scent and make it dusty sandalwood-dominant as it dries, vanilla seems to always linger in the background, and that's how it stays for the most part. Complex, powerful, quite a stunner of a creation. My favourite PdM.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2294912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2294912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Update after 24 hours, I can still smell the perfume on my clothes its more like a herbal lavender, I think its more a masculine scent I use Tuscan Leather as a women but this definitely a man fragrance, after 24 hours I rate it 7.5/10 for the smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The tonka, patchouli, and opoponax don't blend well for me and smells messy. Like the sillage smells okay, but nose up close is a bit poopy. <br />
So PDM is hit or miss for me, looking forward to trying more of them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2284864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2284864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962748">Aram0000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best fragrances I've smelled. So beautiful. Also favourite from PDM.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2281614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2281614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281562" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maxmiller614"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maxmiller614" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192051">Maxmiller614</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alright so off the opening alone I figured I would hate this. It's strong patchouli, almost medicinal (cough syrup) like, with a massive hit of sweetness. Opening reminded me alot of Black Orchid by Tom Ford at first.  <br />
<br />
But, I kept an open mind and typically the story with PDM is their nice dry downs (in my opinion). So I gave it 30 minutes and just sat with it, and it completely reshaped itself. It became this gorgeous, dry sweet, chocolately earthy experience that I couldn't stop digging my nose into. <br />
<br />
Theres a little bit of spiciness, a little bit of rosyness, and more. It truly is a mysterious scent that I can't quite explain, you just have to try it. Opening is intense but it's worth it. And DO NOT overspray lmao</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2281562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2281562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CamiloD97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1626636"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1626636.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CamiloD97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Vibrato-75930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vibrato"title="Vibrato"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1626636">CamiloD97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine walking through a grand estate at twilight, just as the first stars begin to twinkle in the sky. Youre in a lush garden surrounded by old, towering trees that have stood for centuries. The air is cool, but theres a warmth coming from a distant fire, carried through the breeze. The sweetness of rich, ripe apples floats around you, but its not the crisp, fresh kindmore like a perfectly baked, caramelized apple, soft and indulgent.<br />
<br />
As you continue, the scent deepens. The sweetness is met with the richness of vanilla, but its not just any vanilla. Its like warm, spiced vanilla from an antique cabinet, infused with the smokiness of incense. Theres also a hint of something darkpatchouli or tonka beanadding a mysterious, almost regal depth, like stepping into a dark wood-paneled library with leather-bound books and the faintest hint of tobacco.<br />
<br />
The experience is luxurious, almost velvety, with that initial sweetness never fading completely. It lingers in the air like a gentle embrace, evolving slowly into something deeper, darker, and more seductive. Carlisle feels like the kind of scent youd wear while sipping a dark, spiced rum by a roaring fire, wrapped in a velvet cloak, knowing full well you smell like pure elegance and power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2280667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2280667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentsibilities"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286339"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentsibilities" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Red-Tobacco-46663.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46663.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Tobacco"title="Red Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286339">Scentsibilities</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 13:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fantasies scents opens slightly rough as the notes hit you at once even rougher than Red Tobacco.Which isn't rough just potent however this opens up to one of the Best warm fruity spicy resinous fragrances ever.The rose adds a beautiful romantic classy element.Does it share similarities to Red Tobacco yes however that's bolder and more complex also more masculine.Thats truly an unrestrained tobacco cigar beast this is about the fruity spicy amber patchouli combo.Its not redundant to have both</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Very gentle and smooth spicy notes of nutmeg along with freshness of apple<br />
Incensy but still soft and smooth<br />

More masculine but can be unisex, very classy and timeless<br />
Like a library in an old mansion in a fantasy story setting where time stops</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2274533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2274533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
