It smells similar to powdered veggie mix you might add to a smoothie. Maybe its the batch. Performance is pretty good and miles ahead of all other PdM's I've tried besides Herod. Far better alternative to Layton which I feel is massively overrated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2274197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2274197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271540" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PigBiglet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2131711"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2131711.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PigBiglet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2131711">PigBiglet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw the hype for this and decided to buy a bottle. The performance on this stuff is insane, 2 sprays lasts all day and projects heavily. Smell wise, I dont like it. To me it just smells like straight up playdoh. Ive worn a sample a few times now really trying hard to like it, but its just not good TO ME. Also, Im not one to usually care if its a summer or winter fragrance, but when I wore this stuff for the first time in July, it genuinely made me nauseous. Certain people will love this stuff, Im just not one of those people. Traded my bottle for Initio side effect which is my favorite fragrance of all time so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2271540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2271540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can see why this has alot of hype and love. Truly is a captivating, powerful, uplifting scent. Smells like Layton and oajan had a baby. This is the second best I've smell of PDM, in my opinion, nothing is beating Layton exclusif.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2268196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2268196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have to say when I tried Carlisle for the first time I was super disappointed it lasted 3-4 hours with 1 hour of moderate projection and I felt so disappointed, 2 or 3 month later I pulled one of my 10 ml decant bottles and I thought maybe I'll just reapply when needed and maaaan surprisingly it lasted waaay longer and kept projecting off my shirt next day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1675710">DscentFellow007</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I own a newer batch.. <br />
sadly the claims are true, I tested 4 frags yesterday and Carlisle was the first one to die off.. lasted about 2 hr at best.. what a waste of money</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2258218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2258218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256553" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to like Carlisle but i'm personally not a fan. I think this must be for the seasoned nose because there's a ton of glowing reviews from reputable influencers online. Very mature and I'm not so sure if I understand this fragrance. I'm not there yet with Carlisle on my fragrance journey.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2256553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2256553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250510" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jayzilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jayzilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250510ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250510" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202765">Jayzilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolute masterpiece. This is sometimes hard for me to describe, its quite complex. I find it resinous, fruity, woody, smoky, and vanillic - but it has this other element to it, almost like umami. I feel like a bottle of Grand Soir, Side Effect or Althair might be a more sensible winter buy for my small collection. More mass appealing. More agreeable. But yet my heart tells me Carlisle. It also feels like I'm getting more for my money because I feel that this scent profile is harder to replicate with a cheap formulation (over the aforementioned). I've never received a compliment with Carlisle and I don't expect one. This is so far from what an average nose is accustomed to. I think it's purpose is to add another layer to your masculinity as opposed to reeling in affirmations that cheaply reassure. I only wear this dressed up and in dark clothing, on a date, eating somewhere or having a cigar night. It feels mysterious, mature and self-assured.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2250510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2250510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241536" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rev0lut10n"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rev0lut10n" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-Elixir-84074.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84074.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled Elixir"title="Boss Bottled Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073182">rev0lut10n</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rich and complex scent with real development. I do get something animalic in the opening, but it goes after a few minutes. An intoxicating and addictive scent that you will keep going back to sniff. It's a dark beast. It does share some similarity with Red Tobacco, but it's definitely different enough (for me) to warrant owning both. The best PDM I have tried so far (Haltane, Oajan, Herod, Layton and this). One of the only scents I would consider taking out a mortgage for.<br />
<br />
A masterpiece of modern perfumery in my opinion.<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2241536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2241536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Although that being said, whenever I smell this on someone else, their scent bubble does smell much nicer like creamy spicy apple. Insane longevity, but overall not something id wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2241525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2241525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239759" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jxespino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jxespino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/40-Knots-16445.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16445.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="40 Knots"title="40 Knots"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026357">jxespino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For a long time (almost 2 years), my favorite fragrance has been Amouage Jubilation XXV. I have almost 100 fragrances and, even though I love a lot of them, Jubilation was the clear winner... that is until Carlisle arrived. Delicious scent, strong, dark. Refined and original, yet, easy to wear. Love it! My favorite Marly Fragrance so far, and perhaps, in some time could de-throne/ share the podium with Jubilation XXV. Recommend 1000%</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2239759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2239759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210502">KJVKIWI</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the best of Parfums de Marly in my opinion and my signature scent. It starts off with a spicy apple note where you get wafts of it for hours. Later you will begin to smell a tobacco note even though it isn't listed. The dry down can be compared to Red Tobacco but Carlisle is smooth and rich the whole way through from beginning to end. 10/10 for me....a perfect masterpiece of a fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2236932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2236932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235586" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Porobear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874308"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874308.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Porobear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Parfum-49912.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49912.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874308">Porobear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 06:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favourite Parfums de Marly. This is darkness. Vanilla, nutmeg and saffron off of the top, rose to give it a bit of softness, and patchouli to fill in the gaps. The fragrantica page has changed a lot here, with apple going in and out. I'm unsure if that's because it adapts to the most recent formulations. In any case, I don't get any apple, I don't get any smoke. On my skin, this is a patchouli, nutmeg and saffron bomb. With the nutmeg and saffron calming down later on in exchange for a bit of rose.<br />
<br />
10/10. I wouldn't change anything.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2235586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2235586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983287">CoconutCoconut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2232810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2232810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230494" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230494" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wytelyne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2202596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wytelyne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230494ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230494" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2202596">Wytelyne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 18:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very spicy, incense-y and strong. Easy 10+ hours and projects on me for 8 hours with 4-5 sprays. You will get compliments for sure. Early 2020 batch. So I've worn this 3 times now and I've gotten a compliment(s) each time. The first time I wore it the bus driver asked me for the name and to show him on google so he doesn't forget. The second time I layered it with Superz Memories Gold and as I stepped in the car my cousin's bf said I "smell good" and he said it like three times and the third time I wore it to a dinner layered with Herod. I sprayed Herod on my neck and inside elbows and Carlisle twice on my shirt. My friend leaned into me and said, "did i tell you that you smelled nice?" On clothing Carlisle smells very fruity. incense and fruity and projects very well. Only 2 sprays and it was all I could smell. I sprayed Herod first as it was going to be my scent for the night but it seemed I was experiencing a little anosmia because earlier in the day I sprayed it once on my hand and it was projecting strongly. So to be safe I had to touch up with Carlisle. Carlisle is a beast!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2230494"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2230494#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227354" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="O Olfatista"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191809.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="O Olfatista" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191809">O Olfatista</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 15:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Uma fragrncia de muita qualidade. Noz-moscada muito natural e excepcionalmente harmnica com as demais notas com destaque para a baunilha no final de muita qualidade.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223626" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KhaledAlshahrani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198979"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2198979.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KhaledAlshahrani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223626ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223626" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198979">KhaledAlshahrani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My 2nd favourite cologne Im addicted .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2223626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2223626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221966" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FitzLi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2166480"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FitzLi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2166480">FitzLi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 02:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im a big wood lover. Tom Ford Oud Wood was my first love, and Nishane Kredo is my signature scent. Not surprisingly, Carlisle is one of my favorite scents from Parfums de Marly.<br />
The scent opens like a whisky candy; a little bit boozy and somewhat sweet. Before I could fully comprehend the experience, the wood jumped in and dragged me to the dark side. The opening is rich and lively. I felt like watching a fight scene and hoping that my eyes could move faster to catch all the actions.<br />
After it calms down, the boozy sweetness does not blend in with the wood; they alternate. Sometimes the sweetness dominates, and other times the wood takes the center stage. Its a complex scent. I like it so much that when I first smelled it, I regretted buying Kredo too early. Fortunately, the regret was short-lived. It has a terrible performance. After 20 minutes, the scent recedes to skin level; you can only smell it up close. <br />
Parfums de Marly has a good reputation on its performance, and it is reflected on its rating here. However, my experience couldnt be further from it. I saw similar experiences online that, after the recent reformulation, many Parfums de Marly scents now have a much weaker performance. I wish wed met earlier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2221966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2221966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221536" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Berk Y."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2021922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Berk Y." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Kingdom-of-Bahrain-48268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kingdom of Bahrain"title="Kingdom of Bahrain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219267" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Probo11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195225"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Probo11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195225">Probo11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Parfums de Marly Carlisle: Im just gonna get straight to the point. For me the vanilla and patchouli is a great combo and it almost smells like vanilla tobacco. it smells so similar to Parfums de Marly Herod. There is no note of tobacco or cinnamon in Carlisle but somehow i get hints of them throughout the day when im wearing Carlisle. I only have a tester currently buy im definitely going to be buying the actual bottle even though the price tag. If you like kinda vanilla and cinnamony and kinda tobacco-ish fragrances this is for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2219267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2219267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219253" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ndabeat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2124212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ndabeat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124212">ndabeat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initially, I wasn't too impressed with Carlisle by Parfums de Marly and didn't quite understand the hype within the fragrance community. However, over time, it has really grown on me. The vanilla and patchouli combination is now something I deeply appreciate. I realize my initial lukewarm reaction was due to trying it in the summer, but this fragrance truly shines in colder weather. It's a standout scent that has earned its place in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2219253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2219253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TronFrags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2153997"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2153997.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TronFrags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); <br />
Gives off spicebomb vibes, but way more smooth and higher quality. <br />
Perfect Signature for Winter. <br />
<br />
Overall: 8.5/10 would try a sample if you're thinking about it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2214671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2214671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213798" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Literally 1984"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2158041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Literally 1984" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158041">Literally 1984</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 02:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked it in the opening but it definitely was not love. After 20 or so minutes, it is wonderful. I can't say for sure if this is my favorite PDM so far, but it's definitely one of them. Insanely sweet to my nose though. 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2213798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2213798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2208902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200924" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zy16soul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zy16soul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132282">zy16soul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 05:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Red Tobacco its my favourite and it works so well on my skin, but impossible to wear in tropical hot weather, and my mother loathes it XD.<br />
So I had high hopes for Carlisle Since it seem more wearable for my kind of weather. So I got a 10ml decant<br />
First impressions Red Tobacco, but remove the sharpness, and smooth it out 100 times, more elegant and confident, and bold, intensely strong with a great huge aura of projection.<br />
But the tobacco note even though its not in the list, I do smell a bit of it, unlike red tobacco<br />
Its has vanilla, spices and woods my three favourite. Its a bit fruity, almost like a sun dried sugar coated apple.<br />
The one I got is a newer batch.<br />
10+ hours on my skin<br />
Amazing masterpiece</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2200924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2200924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2199310"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2199310#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197721" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luxsfantasy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="luxsfantasy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025367">luxsfantasy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 01:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the sexiest perfume i've smelt &amp; the definition of sultry.<br />
Opoponax/vanilla base gives it a balsamic sweet feel, patchouli carries the perfume &amp; gives it a dark twist, while the nutmeg &amp; saffron gives spiciness counteracted with the freshness of the greens (apple, davana, rose &amp; osmanthus) combined with the warmth of the rest of the notes make it super well blended. The sillage is amazing and it lasts a lot.<br />
How to wear it? Think nighttime black tie event high-end little black dress.<br />
Some think it has a medicinal smell and thats because of the patchouli effect. It is 100% very cloying.<br />
Not an everyday perfume and it is not for the faint of heart so definitely not a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2197721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2197721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195130" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Le Smelleur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156885"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2156885.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Le Smelleur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); Afterwards it becomes better, a vanilla-herbal scent with a distinct bitter component. This should be good for cold weather.<br />
<br />
Read more of my perfume reviews at https://thescentstories.substack.com</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2195130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2195130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194450" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nutucker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001305"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001305.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nutucker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001305">Nutucker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Guy this is miles ahead of red tobacco and in my top 5, I get 8-9 hrs performance. This is a beautiful spicy resinous apple with patchouli and vanilla, so beautiful. I understand many people dislike this because its a very patchouli forward fragrence, and its a note that many my hate but this juice is great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2194450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2194450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178709" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aldwyn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1984372.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aldwyn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Argos/Adonis-Awakens-80245.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80245.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Adonis Awakens"title="Adonis Awakens"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984372">Aldwyn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As Im testing side by side with Herod, a few things immediately come to mind. 1- This is an amazing fragrance 2- I thoroughly enjoy this more than Herod and 3- This is an oddly familiar scent. I go to the similar to, and there it is. Intense Red Tobacco. Personally, Im not against owning similar smelling fragrances if there is enough of a difference to my nose, but this just smells way too similar to justify a full bottle at the price as I already own Intense Red Tobacco. Its a shame because I really was looking for any reason to add this to the collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2178709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2178709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178502" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jace_noir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1894671"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1894671.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jace_noir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178502ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178502" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1894671">jace_noir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really interested in this fragrance because I had heard so many people saying that this is a very dark fragrance and how not everyone can pull it off. I was really looking forward for a dark and distinct fragrance and although it smells really good with a great scent trail and great performance I didn't really find it to be dark as It just smelled like a mass appealing smokey vanilla green apple scent. Although I think it's great I don't think this fragrance really smells like the way others advertise it. Overall great like a 8/10 but a little overpriced in my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2178502"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2178502#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But after 15-20 minutes it transformed into literally one of the best scents that I have ever smelled, what the hell is that. I even loved more than Herod or Tom Ford Noire Extreme which are my go to fragrances for fall&amp;winter. Herod got empty so I will replace it with Carlisle but I dont know how will I push through the initial opening phase every time just to reach that beautiful smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Wouldn't recommend if you're going to be trying to get close to anyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2177535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2177535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175148" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 21:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Carlisle is a multi-faceted vanilla fragrance that is a hard one for me to review even after wearing it 5 times as there is something new every time that shines. The opening at first was reminiscent of Blessed Baraka a lot, but the apple can come off Layton-ish to my nose every now and then. The dry down is where it gets warmer and creamier with osmanthus and opopanax lasting up to 8-10 hours on me and would be a perfect wintertime signature fragrance if you love it enough to pay for a bottle, try it out</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2175148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2175148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172539" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheFraganist55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029669.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheFraganist55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669">TheFraganist55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a rollercoaster, wow. The opening is super dark, harsh, and unforgiving. But then as it dries down it becomes this masculine, warm, mysterious, and powdery vanilla. Lowkey the most masculine fragrance I've ever smelled. Perfect for the cold weather, date nights, night time in general, or for rainy, cold, cloudy days. It smells like something Batman would wear. Don't even get me started on the performance. POWER BABY</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="2172539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=2172539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
