</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1726384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1726384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bray08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1654293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1654293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bray08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1726384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1726384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1654293">Bray08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-05">01/05/23 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OH MY GOD! Where do I begin? <br />
 <br />
I am a flight attendant so I've smelled my fair share of perfumes/colognes in a confined space. And I have despised Dior Sauvage and Versace Eros for a long time now as a result.  I was working to Paris in business class and I was getting ready to give out the menus for dinner, I walk by the first row and I IMMEDIATELY stopped, turned around and asked this elegant man in a suit what he was wearing and he said in his french accent "Ahhh yes its Carlisle" I said "I have no idea what that is but its the sexiest fragrance I have ever smelled in my life." He laughed and told me that he is the founder of a famous fragrance house called Parfums de Marly and that he was so glad I loved his scent. We chatted for a while inflight and every single time I went to serve him a drink he knew how in love I was with the scent. He asked me what hotel I was staying at and to write down my name for him. Usually I don't tell anyone where I am staying but his accent, smell, and elegance convinced me. Later that day I wake up to someone knocking on my hotel door. Outside my door was a big HEAVY ASS bag on the floor. I bring it inside my room and I see it has 6 boxes of perfumes in it. I now own this gorgeous fragrance along with Layton, Layton Eclusif, Herod, and Habdan. Carlisle is my favorite.  So I decided to make an account on here to share how I fell in love with this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="1726384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=1726384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent972087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc972087" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WasitSomethingISaid?"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125333"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1125333.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WasitSomethingISaid?" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Baccarat-Rouge-540-33519.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33519.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baccarat Rouge 540"title="Baccarat Rouge 540"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma972087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd972087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1125333">WasitSomethingISaid?</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-15">08/15/18 17:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>HO-LY-SMOKES!!!<br />
<br />
I've heard people raving about this for a while now so had my expectations way out of this world.  Blind bought this bad boy and DAAAAAAMN!  <br />
<br />
The rumours are true...this thing blew me away.  Dark, mysterious, seductive, heck I may even rock this in the dead of summer, it just smells that good!<br />
<br />
You owe it to yourself to put your nose on this.  Big time banger from a fantastic house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="972087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=972087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1407299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1407299" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kterhark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.12596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kterhark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Agua-de-Sevilla/Agua-de-Naranjos-16229.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16229.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Agua de Naranjos"title="Agua de Naranjos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1407299ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1407299" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12596">Kterhark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-09">09/09/21 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I ordered the feminine discovery set which comes with a complimentary sample, so I choose carlisle blindly.  I knew it was on the masculine side so i thought I would gift it to my brother in law.  Nope.  I'm keeping it for myself. <br />
I fell into perfumery in 2009 when passing the Guerlain shop in Las Vegas.  The attendant spritzed me w/ Bois D'Armenie and sent me on my way.  That night, and into the next morning, I kept getting wisps of this luscious, vanilla-like woody goodness.  I was hooked for life an the art form known as 'perfumery'. <br />
I'm not saying Carlisle smells like Bois D'Armenie but it creates the same emotional experience.  So much so that I may have to buy ...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="1407299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=1407299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent994475" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc994475" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bart4543"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/133258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.133258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bart4543" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Edition-Blanche-2653.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2653.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Edition Blanche"title="Allure Homme Edition Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma994475ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd994475" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/133258">bart4543</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-24">10/24/18 21:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Full note breakdown based on the tester bottle sticker<br />
<br />
Top Notes - Green apple, Nutmeg, Saffron<br />
Heart Notes - Tonka bean, Osmanthus, Davana, Rose<br />
Base Notes - Vanilla, Patchouli, Opoponax, Resinoid, Sandalwood<br />
<br />
<br />
Picked this up few days ago cant believe how amazing it is. Herod has been dethroned as my  favorite pdm. What i get from this is the apple pie feeling from oajan mix with the smoky resinious apple crumble of habdan and the dessert like kulfi note in tom ford noir extreme. The final result is absolutely intoxicating. Its sweet warm spicy fruity dark boozy smooth gorumand fragrance made for winter and fall. Carlise has that beautiful pdm dna (warm sweet wood patchouli combo) but the davana gives this fragrance a liquorice feel that is unique to this pdm which i really like.Laslty performance is insane, the strongest from.the house even stronger and thicker than oajan<br />
<br />
Scent 10 out of 10<br />
Projection 9 out of 10<br />
Longevity 9 out of 10<br />
<br />
My Current top 5 pdm favorites <br />
1)carlisle<br />
2)herod<br />
3)godolphin<br />
4)habdan<br />
5)oajan</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="994475"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=994475#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1857042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1857042" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rickkkkky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rickkkkky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1857042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1857042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); I guess it's time to start waiting for the wintertime again<br />

Edit: never mind, got scammed </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="1857042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=1857042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="33514" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105584">andrewg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-27">12/27/19 18:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well blended, I respect the craft. A well done fragrance.  Living in south Florida makes it a challenge however in wearing this particular scent.  I could see this scent shining in cold weather, would be too cloying in the heat.  For someone that loves this scent, I would recommend a decant, as 90% of situations of wearing this will be too cloying.  I cant really see this as mass pleasing as I dont really like the smell and neither does my girlfriend.  I respect the craft though and acknowledge its a unique and mysterious fragrance.  <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Rating: 5/10<br />
Compliments: 3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="1128351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=1128351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1622157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; For me it has a orange creamsicle tobacco vibe which is cool but nothing about it stands out to feel unique for my experience. Completely smooth and if you wear it you are going to smell good and better than 90% of the designer frags. However this is my Initial Impression. I will wear it a few more times to see how it changes for me and update. 7/9/19</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="1077308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=1077308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1269461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1269461" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ariany"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ariany" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1269461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1269461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274126">ariany</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-02">01/02/21 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's so heavy and complex! Super thick, cloying if sprayed too much, go light on the trigger, 2 sprays max. I don't smell any Layton but has some similarities with Herod but much heavier. I don't recommend if you don't enjoy heavy, sweet, gourmand fragrances. I'm not saying it's similar to Black Phantom but gave me the same feeling which I didn't enjoy either. I had a couple of friends with me which said this is too much! Get a sample before committing to 250+ dollars.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="33514"comment_id="1269461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html?ccid=1269461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="33514" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <div id="offCanvasRight"
                    class="off-canvas in-canvas-for-large position-right is-closed"
             data-off-canvas>
    <div class="hide-for-large"
         style="width: 2em; position: relative; margin: 0 1em;">

    <div class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 0.5em;"><span>Perfume Encyclopedia</span></div>
<div>Perfumes: <b>98,516</b><br/>
    Fragrance Reviews: <b>1,929,381</b><br/>
    Perfume lovers: <b>1,388,876</b><br/>
    <span style="
            background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 48.335483870968%, rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 48.335483870968%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 48.335483870968%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            ">Online right now: <b>3,746</b></span><br/>
    <visitors-histogram :visitors='[1051,1088,3092,1120,1061,1078,1104,3178,1125,1132,1066,1056,2528,1130,1083,1124,1097,1764,1010,1099,1067,1041,1210,974,989,1040,983,1016,877]'></visitors-histogram>
</div>
            <div class="strike-title"><span>Register</span></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
